detailsData.title: Personalized Service
detailsData.content: At John K. Zaid & Associates, ourHouston auto accident attorneys have a proven record of obtaining successful results for people who have been injured in car accidents, workplace accidents, and other personal injuries. We serve clients from Houston to Clear Lake and throughout Texas, offering personal service and a dedication to results.

detailsData.title: Clients First Philosophy
detailsData.content: We believe that service clients are our #1 priority. Our law firm has been trusted by thousands of injury and accident victims across the Houston, Texas, area. Our injury lawyers and Attorneys go the distance to ensure injury claims are processed quickly and efficiently so that our clients are ensured a successful road to recovery.

detailsData.title: Highly Rated Law Firm
detailsData.content: If you or someone you love was injured in Houston or somewhere else in Texas, it is imperative to be represented not just by a personal injury law firm with lawyers licensed to practice in Texas but one that is highly rated by peers, professional organizations, and previous clients.

detailsData.title: Dedicated Legal Team
detailsData.content: The dedicated legal team at John K. Zaid & Associates has successfully protected the rights of injured people and their families in Houston and throughout Texas for over 15 years. Our lawyers, paralegals, and staff work together to give our clients personalized and compassionate care while efficiently providing them with top-notch services.

subHeading: HIGHLY RATED HOUSTON PERSONAL INJURY LAWYERS
valueProp: The personal injury law firm of John K. Zaid & Associates has been protecting the rights of many different types accident victims since 2002. We are familiar with Houston courts, judges and their staff. While there are many personal injury lawyers in Houston and throughout Texas, not many can offer you the highly personalized service backed by a track record of success that John K. Zaid & Associates has a history of providing.

testimonalData.text: If you're currently reading this know that I'm writing this review voluntarily. I'm not an individual that regularly do this sort of thing, but the individuals at John K. Zaid & Associates were very professional and courteous. I appreciate everything Zaid Law have done for me--they work swiftly to make sure you get your life back on track. I highly recommend them!
testimonalData.author: Mario Mcmeans

testimonalData.text: John K. Zaid worked very hard to make sure that I got fair and equitable settlement, and that I got the best care.
testimonalData.author: Emma L.

testimonalData.text: I recommend John K. Zaid & Associates to anybody that wants to have a successful case.
testimonalData.author: Ron P.
